product_name: Pearl Izumi ELITE Barrier Convertible Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi ELITE Barrier convertible bike jacket has removable sleeves, so it's an ideal choice for chilly mornings that lead to warm afternoons. Lightweight ELITE Barrier fabric is wind- and water-resistant as well as extremely breathable; soft micromesh inner collar adds warmth and helps manage moisture for comfort. Direct-Vent side panels provide additional ventilation. 1-piece integrated sleeves can be removed to convert jacket into a vest; stow the sleeves in rear pocket. Full-length zipper helps you regulate body temperature; includes a protective draft flap to keep wind out and warmth in. Drawcord at hem can be cinched with one hand while riding; adjustable cuffs with rip-and-stick tabs. Semifitted design enhances performance and prevents fabric from flapping in slipstream. 2 zippered handwarmer pockets and 1 zippered rear pocket allow you to keep cycling essentials close at hand. The Pearl Izumi ELITE Barrier convertible bike jacket features reflective accents to increase visibility during low light conditions.
